fields.name: ID
fields.title: Transaction unique identifier
fields.description: A reference number which is generated automatically recording each published sale. The number is unique and will change each time a sale is recorded

fields.name: Price
fields.title: Price
fields.description: Sale price stated on the Transfer deed

fields.name: Date of Transfer
fields.title: Date of Transfer
fields.description: Date when the sale was completed, as stated on the Transfer deed

fields.name: Old/New
fields.title: Old/New
fields.description: Y = a newly built property, N =  an established residential building

fields.name: Duration
fields.title: Duration
fields.description: Relates to the tenure. F-Freehold, L-Leasehold etc

fields.name: PAON
fields.title: Primary Addressable Object Name
fields.description: Primary Addressable Object Name. If there is a sub-building for example the building is divided into flats, see Secondary Addressable Object Name (SAON)

fields.name: SAON
fields.title: Secondary Addressable Object Name
fields.description: Secondary Addressable Object Name. If there is a sub-building, for example the building is divided into flats, there will be a SAON

fields.name: Record Status
fields.title: Record Status
fields.description: Indicates additions, changes and deletions to the records
